title: 如何让玩家在暮色森林圈不了地?
author: 夜鸣蛋

replies.author: ddyy163
replies.txt_content: 去到暮色森林里面 打 /mangdelp default residence.*

replies.author: 练习册
replies.txt_content: GroupManager把玩家在暮色森林的res权限去掉
